name: Burger Runner
description:
This game was made during the Orbital Game Jam 3.

Burger Runner is a fast paced local-multiplayer game in which you eat burgers, get fat enough and body-slam your skinny friends. Race and fight on an infinitely procedurally generated track and compete for the top spot.

Can be played with a friend on one keyboard (WASD + shift, and arrows + right control), or you can plug up to 4 gamepads to play with many friends !
